enGB: Mindful weapons are unusually heavy with knowledge. A wielder can choose to apply her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with a mindful weapon in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier (whichever is higher). This modifier to damage is reduced for off-hand weapons.
zhCN: 凝思武器蕴藏着异常渊博的知识。持有者可以用他的智力调整值代替力量调整值应用与伤害检定。这种武器在作副手武器使用时智力调整值减半
